已知橢圓曲線加密 Ep: y^2 = x^3 + 83429012314x + 537815446218682092241

p = 247504286477734717025223891635962584427 GF(p)

G = (110271161023026554555288231023211718287,182952992754044905087422853547556720189)
d = 3214247

求公鑰PK=d*G=(x,y)

flag格式 = flag{md5(x+y)}，例如假如x=0,y=1則flag = flag{c4ca4238a0b923820dcc509a6f75849b}


flag: flag{57a69d469a6f3746f3952d9f8bdb9ed0}
